dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of a mixture of 40 Gaussian distributions, used to evaluate the performance of sampling methods in capturing multi-modal distributions.
dcterms:title: Mixture of 40 Gaussians

dcterms:creator: D. Barber
C. M. Bishop
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating Bayesian neural networks, characterized by complex and multi-modal posterior distributions.
dcterms:title: Bayesian Neural Networks

dcterms:creator: L. I. Midgley
V. Stimper
G. N. C. Simm
B. Schölkopf
J. M. Hernández-Lobato
dcterms:description: A dataset representing molecular dynamics of the alanine dipeptide, used to sample equilibrium configurations from the Boltzmann distribution.
dcterms:title: Molecular Dynamics (alanine dipeptide)

dcterms:creator: L. I. Midgley
V. Stimper
G. N. C. Simm
B. Schölkopf
J. M. Hernández-Lobato
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of a mixture of delta distributions, used to evaluate the performance of sampling methods in capturing multi-modal distributions.
dcterms:title: Mixture of Deltas

dcterms:creator: X. Huang
Y. H. Hanze Dong
Y. Ma
T. Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset used in the Reverse Diffusion Monte Carlo method, focusing on sampling from complex distributions.
dcterms:title: Reverse Diffusion Monte Carlo
